Blog.post: hi YAY, I'm home for one week! I'm off to my caravan in York 2day though, I'm staying till monday, so I won't be posting anything for a cupla days. I wore my skirt again 2day, I was cold!! ha lol I was sposed to be goin on holiday 2day, but my dad hasn't booked anything, we're planning on goin next friday, but nothins booked for that either. Laura wasn't at skool 2day again, but me and Zoe still went on the computers at dinner. So now I haven't got any homework, only Science. I'm goin now, I've had to shut the curtains and pretend I'm not in, cos sumone is cumin round to pick up sum birthday presents, and they're not ready yet, so if they cum, it looks like we're not in!!lol luv Laura xxhugsxxnxxkissesxxx

hey! It's finally thursday! and 2moro it's firday! YAY! off skool for one week, I've probably already said that. I wore my new skirt 2day that I bought on Monday from New Look, I wore it on Tuesday aswell for skool. I don't think I'll be wearing it 2moro though cos it's nor supposed to be as warm. My mum got my sum super cool and groovy sandals that other day, they have toe posts and they are sooo comfy, it's too hard to say! She also got my this case that I'm gonna put my minidisc player in, it's really cute, it's purple, and looks like a mini hiking bag, with all the elastic and clips ans stuff! LOL! I've got to make a mental note that it's the twins birthday on Saturday, and they are 7. I'll remember now. 4ev@. (or maybe not) g2g for my tea, I'm havin Spag Bol. luv Laura xxx

For sum reason, my blog has put a msg I wrote on Wednesday in the Thursday section. Anyway, 2day me and Zoe finished our magazine that we are makin in english, Laura was supposed to be workin with us, but she was off 2day cos she had a headache, and she didn't want to come because of what happend yesterday. Son we've had to miss everything she did out of the mag. oh well. If you find this borin, pls let me know and I'll change the content of my blogs, pls suggest. luv Lauraxxx

I'm here again to write about what happened 2day, I'm treatin this as like a diary. Can other people read this? If you can, can u put a reply on? pls! Anyway;; I set off to skool. Met my friend and went to the shop to buy our dinner. Then did our lessons. At break, the "hard""I'm gonna smash ur head in" girl asked us why we had been bitches to one of our other friends, (which we hadn't) so all her crew sed "Come on, u dont need friends like them, come and hang round with us" So... she did. We didn't like her anyway!

hey, I've just got in from skool. I H8 tha place. But there's only 2 days left then we break up for a week! (yay) I'm supposed to be goin on holiday for this thing in Normandy, France, but nothin has been booked yet. Hopefully I can get my dad to sort sumthin out! Luv Laura xxx

I've put a picture on! It's not of me, but I didn't want to put me on, and seem as though on the preview of my template, it has a barbie doll, I thought I would do the same, I haven't got blonde hair though, I've got brown. It looks a bit evil dunt it! luv Laura xxx
hi, I'm just testin, this is my e-mail address and I was wonderin wot happend when I mailed me blog!
Hello, this is new! I'm just testin to see what happens when I do this cos I aint gotta clue!
